examples: We repeal the core of the disastrous Obamacare.

examples: Water molecules also repel the hydrophobic ends of surfactant molecules.

examples: The child stirred, and his mother wept with gratitude and lamented her earlier callousness, offering all her wealth to Isis in repentance.

examples: The chef carefully arranged the arugula leaves on the plate as a beautiful garnish.
